  • Method Details

    • addPoint

      public PurePursuitPathFollower.Builder addPoint(Point point)
      Add the next point on the path.
      Parameters:
      point - The point to be added to the path, relative to the center of the field.
      Returns:
      This builder to be chained.

    • addPoint

      public PurePursuitPathFollower.Builder addPoint(double x, double y)
      Add the next point on the path.
      Parameters:
      x - The X coordinate of the point to be added to the path, relative to the center of the field.
      y - The Y coordinate of the point to be added to the path, relative to the center of the field.
      Returns:
      This builder to be chained.

    • removePoint

      public PurePursuitPathFollower.Builder removePoint(Point point)
      Remove a point on the path.
      Parameters:
      point - The point to be removed.
      Returns:
      This builder to be chained.

    • removePoint

      public PurePursuitPathFollower.Builder removePoint(int idx)
      Remove a point on the path by index.
      Parameters:
      idx - The index of the point to be removed.
      Returns:
      This builder to be chained.

    • setLookaheadDistance

      public PurePursuitPathFollower.Builder setLookaheadDistance(double lookaheadDistance)
      Sets the lookahead distance in inches.
      Parameters:
      lookaheadDistance - The lookahead distance. A high lookahead distance will curve around corners more than a low lookahead distance. If it is too high, then the robot will cut corners too early and might hit something on the field.
      Returns:
      This builder to be chained.

      public PurePursuitPathFollower.Builder setLocalizer(Localizer<Pose> localizer)
